rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0002
rows.name: Meleph-san, so you were here.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0003
rows.name: ...Is something wrong?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0004
rows.name:
No, not at all.
I've just been thinking.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0005
rows.name: ...Are you worried about something?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0006
rows.name:
Yes, just...
I'm a little concerned
about my younger brother.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0007
rows.name: You mean Emperor Nefer?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0008
rows.name:
Yes...
I'm worried that he might be
pushing himself too hard.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0009
rows.name: The Emperor is quite young, isn't he...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0012
rows.name:
Indeed.
Perhaps too young to bear
the weight of ruling a country...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0013
rows.name: Don't you two ever talk with each other?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0014
rows.name:
I report to him regularly
as Special Inquisitor, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0015
rows.name:
No, I mean as siblings,
not as officials.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0016
rows.name:
Don't you have normal
family conversations?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0017
rows.name: Sibling conversations...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0018
rows.name:
I hate to admit it,
but neither of us knows how to
have casual conversations.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0019
rows.name: You don't need to overthink it.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0020
rows.name:
Any topic that isn't work-related
will do.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0021
rows.name: Why not just visit him?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0022
rows.name: No, he has so many responsibilities...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0023
rows.name:
Chatting with me...
would only be a bother.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0024
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0025
rows.name: He'd be happy to see his older sister.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0026
rows.name: Are you avoiding seeing him, perhaps?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0101
rows.name:
Even Emperor Nefer would be
delighted if his older sister
came to see him!

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0102
rows.name: ...Thank you, Homura.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0103
rows.name:
However,
my brother and I aren't
a normal family after all.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0104
rows.name:
He's the Emperor of Superbia,
and I'm just his Special Inquisitor...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0105
rows.name:
Our positions and life paths
are completely different.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0106
rows.name:
We could never have normal
sibling conversations...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0107
rows.name:
That's not true.
Do you think positions affect
family or sibling relationships?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0108
rows.name: Hikari!? Where did you come from...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0109
rows.name: I got a bit impatient.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0110
rows.name:
You and Emperor Nefer
are actual family, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0111
rows.name:
Then emperor or not,
he's first and foremost
your younger brother.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0112
rows.name: So why complicate things?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0113
rows.name:
Still...
it's been ages since I've approached
our relationship as siblings.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0114
rows.name:
Look at Homura and me.
We weren't in contact
for ages either.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0115
rows.name: But we quickly became close.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0116
rows.name:
That's different,
you're the same...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0117
rows.name: Shut up!

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0118
rows.name:
The fact that you're concerned
about your brother already makes
you family enough.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0119
rows.name:
So forget all that rank
and status nonsense.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0120
rows.name:
Just act like a normal
older sister already!

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0121
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0122
rows.name: Is that really so simple...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0123
rows.name: Absolutely! It's not even a question.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0124
rows.name:
Just chat with him and
let him depend on you.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0125
rows.name:
...Alright then.
I'll work on being a proper
older sister to him.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0126
rows.name:
Promise me you'll do it
the next time you see him.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0127
rows.name:
Understood...
I give you my word.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0128
rows.name: Ah, that's a relief.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0129
rows.name:
Both you and Rex have a habit
of overthinking things,
which makes me anxious.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0130
rows.name:
Heh[ML:Dash ]
Thank you for the advice, Hikari.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0131
rows.name: You're very welcome.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0201
rows.name:
Meleph-san, are you deliberately
avoiding Emperor Nefer?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0202
rows.name: No, that's not the case at all.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0203
rows.name:
I would love to spend quality
time talking with him.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0204
rows.name:
But our respective ranks
create barriers between us...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0205
rows.name: You mean because he's Emperor?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0206
rows.name: Exactly.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0207
rows.name:
When my younger brother took the throne,
I volunteered to be his protector.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0208
rows.name:
And at that time, we discarded
our family relationship.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0209
rows.name: Meleph-san...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0210
rows.name:
Don't get me wrong.
I have no regrets about my choice.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0211
rows.name:
Protecting my younger brother
and Superbia is my greatest happiness
as his older sister.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0213
rows.name:
...As a Blade, I don't have a family of
my own. That's why I cherish the idea
of family ties so much.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0214
rows.name:
You and Emperor Nefer are already
connected by a very strong bond,
aren't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0215
rows.name: So why don't you go to see him?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0216
rows.name:
If you care for each other,
surely you can spend time
just talking together?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0217
rows.name:
If it were me...
I'd want to take my time and talk.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0219
rows.name:
I'm sure Emperor Nefer also
wants to talk with his
older sister.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0220
rows.name:
After all,
that's what family is about,
right?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0221
rows.name:
Bonds aren't something
that can be cut so easily,
are they?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0222
rows.name: ...Homura...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0223
rows.name: Just go see him. Start there.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0224
rows.name:
Titles like "Emperor" or "retainer"
shouldn't come between you.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0225
rows.name:
You don't need an excuse to talk
to your own younger brother!

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0226
rows.name:
I'm certain Emperor Nefer
feels the same way.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0227
rows.name:
Hah, you have a point.
Homura might be right.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0228
rows.name:
Maybe I'm the one who built
this barrier between us.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0229
rows.name:
Then your first step is
to tear down that wall!

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0230
rows.name:
Yes, I'll do my best.
Thank you, Homura.
